use_cases_desc:
Wearable multi-display smartwatch.
Different variations of functions of a classic smartwatch.
contribution_desc:
A new concept for a multi-display (multi-segment) smart watch.
Techniques around how to interact, and what content to show. Much about the design, techniques, etc.
Introduce the concept of: "multiple wearable displays"
use_cases: Custom techniques for the watch, such as expand operation, sliding, swap technique, etc.
crossdevice_def:
Multi-screen or multi-segment example. 
They are wired, so not wireless connectivity, so more like a "mini multi-monitor setup"
